alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Lee; Macon (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 2:18PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Elmore, northwestern Lee, northeastern Macon and southeastern Tallapoosa Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 218 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Eclectic, or 9 miles northwest of Tallassee, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tuskegee, Wetumpka, Tallassee, Camp Hill, Notasulga, Eclectic, Franklin, Waverly, Martin Dam, Santuck, Reeves Airport, Tuskegee National Forest, Southern Lake Martin, Dexter, Liberty City, Tallapoosa City, Blue Ridge, Kowaliga Bridge, Still Waters Resort and Western Lake Martin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
